example.name: autogen1
example.text: But its performance did bear some resemblance to events of two years ago , during the October 1987 global stock market crash .
example.arg: to events of two years ago , during the October 1987 global stock market crash

example.name: autogen2
example.text: The style throughout bears a strong resemblance to Chandler 's prose at its most pared down .
example.arg: to Chandler 's prose at its most pared down
